spreads.name: Leaflet
spreads.description: Draw a tarot card and you can make a divination on any problem.

spreads.name: linear array
spreads.description: As you can see, linear decks are good at interpreting a certain sequence of events, cause and effect, or a way of getting from A to B.

spreads.name: Basic deck
spreads.description: A basic deck is a deck that conveys advice.

spreads.name: Balanced deck
spreads.description: In this card array, the three cards have a common vertex.

spreads.name: celtic cross
spreads.description: This famous 10-card tarot deck is extremely flexible and can provide comprehensive answers to a wide range of topics.

spreads.name: Choose one of the two cards
spreads.description: When you are wavering between two options, this card array can help you see the key between them and make a better choice.

spreads.name: New Year Outlook
spreads.description: This card array is designed to help you make a brief summary of the past year and guide you to make changes to prepare for the issues you will face in the new year.

spreads.name: self-coordination
spreads.description: Before you start working on a business or project, it’s important to lay the foundation.

spreads.name: find a job
spreads.description: This is a tarot deck created for job hunting that attempts to reveal to you what obstacles and issues may be blocking your path, whether internal or external.

spreads.name: Business strategy
spreads.description: This deck will show you all aspects of the issues you care about and provide you with strategies to solve problems and achieve your goals.

spreads.name: Brick by Brick
spreads.description: For those who want to check their work status and status, this card array is suitable.

spreads.name: face challenge
spreads.description: Sometimes, life can be really bad - that's why you need this deck to help you diagnose your problems and figure out how to fix them.

spreads.name: Mind and Heart
spreads.description: In this deck, you will examine various aspects of your emotional and practical life and how your career will affect and be affected by these situations.

spreads.name: Shooting Forward
spreads.description: Sometimes we know what we want but don’t necessarily have a way to get it.

spreads.name: Classic 3 pictures
spreads.description: A classic tarot spread that we recommend using to quickly diagnose the relationship dynamics between two people.

spreads.name: cross array
spreads.description: This 5-card array is an expansion of the classic 3-card array. It expands the card in the middle of the 3-card array into 3 cards from top to bottom, representing the direction of the relationship in the flow of time. It explains in detail

spreads.name: Looking for Love
spreads.description: A new love is always exciting.

spreads.name: Match prediction
spreads.description: This card array focuses on the similarities and differences between the two parties in the relationship, and how well the two parties match each other in different aspects.

spreads.name: Readiness for Love
spreads.description: Before entering into a romantic relationship, we need to examine whether we are ready for it.

spreads.name: Continue or leave
spreads.description: Sometimes, when serious problems arise in a relationship, we must consider separation.

spreads.name: Broken Heart
spreads.description: When things go wrong, it's rare that only one party is at fault.

spreads.name: self growth
spreads.description: When we make choices, we are often torn between our own desires and the expectations of others.

spreads.name: dream mirror
spreads.description: Dreams, whether bizarre or mundane, often represent what our subconscious is trying to tell us.

spreads.name: Jungian Archetypes
spreads.description: Carl Jung was a Swiss psychiatrist and psychoanalyst who is considered one of the founders of analytical psychology.

spreads.name: self love
spreads.description: "Love is not innate. Rather, it requires discipline, focus, patience, faith and overcoming narcissism. It is not a feeling, but a practice." - Erich Fromm, The Art of Loving
